text:
I ain’t got no use for a flashy place like this!
Let’s get outta here quick!

I mean, it’s Costa del Sol!
Costa del Sol!

We~lcome to Costa del Sol!
I’m Kapono, the mayor.
Here’s a little gift for you.

Without this,
your Costa vacation can’t even begin!

This is a paradise of shining sun,
a supreme resort blessed by the heavens!

Forget your dull everyday life in a flash~!
Please, enjoy yourselves to your heart’s content!
The beach is that way, right?

I’d like to take a shower first, though.
Let’s find a hotel.
You ain’t gonna say we’re goin’ swimmin’, are ya?
They’re sayin’ it, huh? They’re totally sayin’ it, right?
Why are you all in a place like this!

No, don’t tell me.
Nothing good ever comes from getting mixed up with you lot.

I’m here on a business trip to escort some executives.
Just don’t get in my way, got it?

Today, we’re bustling with guests
who came to see the parade in Junon.
All the popular hotels are fully booked.

I could refer you to a recently opened hotel,
but it’s not exactly something I can recommend…

Between you and me, some shady folks are involved,
so I’d steer clear if I were you.

Today, we’re only accepting
guests with reservations.
We look forward to your next visit.
Welcome! Please take your time and relax.

Hey, buddy, ever thought of
becoming a hotel owner in dreamy Costa?
I’ve got just the deal for ya.
Get this—it’s a tenth of the market price!

Can’t quite say why,
but someone’s real eager to offload this property.

C’mon, it’s a hot tourist spot!
You’ll make your money back in no time.

Hey, everyone, long time no see!
You all look well!
What are you doing here, Johnny?
Johnny, the man, is makin’ his big move!
I became a hotel owner, yo!
Well, it’s just a tiny hotel, though.

We were just looking for a place to rest.
Can we stop by?

Whoa, that’s a dream come true!
You’re super, super, suuuper welcome!
Truth is, since we opened, we’ve had zero guests.

Aw, c’mon, with our bond?
No need to hold back!

Don’t get lost now,
make sure you follow me close, okay?

Just bought it, so it’s a bit messy,
but it’s got a pretty nice vibe goin’ on~
Man~ It’s a long story, but…

I finally left Midgar with my mind made up,
but no job, no cash, no girlfriend—totally screwed.

Lyin’ in an alley like some piece of trash,
then Mayor Kapono calls out to me.

He said if I didn’t have a job,
he’d hook me up with a cheap property as a special favor!

The sale price? Half the market value!
And on top of that, he threw in a fat loan!
For a ‟seaside,” I ain’t seein’ no sea!
Here it comes—the salty sea breeze!
And all you guys can bunk together in Room 103.

For Tifa, I’ll give a huge discount!
Today’s—

Oh—sorry!
I got a call from Mayor Kapono.

It’s all yours today,
so just kick back however you like!
If you’re headin’ to the beach, change properly, alright?
And no bringin’ in those dangerous weapons!

Man~ I’d kill to see Tifa in resort wear
with my own eyes!
Well, it’s a place like this, so nice and easy.
I give up, I give up.

Guess I’ll check out the area… Oh,
gotta change first, huh?
Yeah, this is more like it.

The breeze feels nice.
Not a bad place to stay.

This is a bed… right?
Feels like the bottom’ll give out if I sit on it.
Sorry, looks like I’m on guard duty.

Hey, bro~ Instead of that dump,
I can hook you up with a way better place.

That rundown shack ain’t worth 100 gil,
and they even saddled him with debt!

These days, who’d fall
for a scam like that, huh?

Coming to the beach
and staying solo is such a waste~!
I’ve got some exciting news just for you.

Right now in Costa del Sol,
we’re holding an event to spark new encounters for our guests.
A lovely memory overflowing with love, just for you.
So, how about it? Wanna join in, handsome?
I’ve got business with someone. See ya.

Oh my, a friend?
Then can you pass this along to him?

Those black-robed guys are kinda weird, right?
They’re gathering at the beach, and everyone’s freaked out.
Ignoring the dress code and totally ruining the vibe.
Take them somewhere else, pretty please~!

But you,
dressed like that, you can’t get on the beach either!

This is Costa del Sol!
You’ve gotta let loose a little more!

With that ticket, you can join
‘Pirates’ Rampage’ and ‘Card Carnival’ events.

A partner with the same number
should be waiting for you at the venue.

Clear the games with your partner,
and you’ll get an Amour Card as a prize!
You can trade that card for resort wear.

Meet the dress code
and make some awesome memories!
Here’s to the best encounter ever~!

Today, you can’t enter the beach
without resort wear.

If you’re going to the beach,
please change into resort wear!

Want some ice cream, Cloud?
Oh, or maybe you’re here to flirt~?

Hyu~ Hyu~!
‟You look cute in that swimsuit~,” huh?
‟You look cute in that swimsuit~,” huh?
What’s that? You’ve got some taste after all?

Hey, don’t ya wanna make me one of the gang?
I can be useful in all kinda ways!

Ugh~ There’s always one, right? Always!
The ‟not interested” human’s everywhere!

If you let me join,
I’ll tickle your curiosity button, y’know?
Just don’t get in our way anymore.
That’s somethin’ I wouldn’t get anyway.

If you let me join,
I could even hop into your little talks, y’know~?

Things get fun with me around~!
Plus, I’d totally freshen up the team!
Looks like the black robes are gatherin’ up.
Ain’t like they’ve even done anythin’ wrong.

Folks freak out or get creeped out on their own,
then try to shoo ‘em off like stray mutts.
Sorry for making you play lookout.

Huh, it won’t stop.
It’s falling apart all over.
What color does this look like to you?
At least back when I was in Midgar.

Materia is solidified Lifestream.
Inside is memory, knowledge…

You’re heading to the beach, right?
Why not invite Tifa and check out the town?

Going solo’s a bad idea.
If you’re heading out, take Tifa with you.
Wanna head outside? How’s the prep going?
We’ve gotta find some cute clothes in town.

Costa~!
You ladies heading to the beach next?

Looking for resort wear?
How about joining ‘Amour in Costa’?

It’s a game event to help
make memories in Costa.
There’s even a game you can play with your pet!
Right? Here’s a pair of tickets.
And an extra one for your pup.

you can join the ‘Run Wild’ race,
‘Rendezvous with Wheelie,’ uh, and then~
Pass it off, pass it off!
They said they’d come by ship, but switched to a helicopter.

They said arrival was in two hours,
but they got here 30 minutes early…
The info from HQ is always so sloppy!

I came to greet some bigwig from Shinra,
since they’re supposed to show up.
Gotta head to their hotel and roll out the red carpet.
I wonder what kinda person this Shinra exec is.
They say his lab coat’s super cool!
Get this—he’s already at the hotel!

It’s luggage for a Shinra bigshot.
Taking it to the hotel now.
I ain’t some rat crawling in the gutter anymore!
Tifa’s as graceful as a dolphin.
Tifa’s as big-hearted as a whale.
Aerith’s as flexible as a jellyfish.
Aerith’s as swirly as a snail.
Ain’t no damn tension here at all!
Watch out. Overdo it, and it’ll sting later.
Cloud might turn bright red too!
Wanna rub oil on each other?
What’s this? You lot came too, did you?

Of course, if you’d cooperate,
I’d welcome it.
My little spectacle’s about to begin.

How about it? Be my assistant.
Shinra Company will guarantee your life.

The experiment I’m planning
needs a female assistant.
Yes, the creation of a new hero.

A hero needs beauty
that makes everyone bow down.

A hero isn’t just about talent or deeds—
it’s a title earned through impression.
Dunno what that means, but it’s amaaazing!

Weeelcome, Professor!
Did the girls meet your expectations?
Your lab coat’s so sexy and stylish!

Hey, those glasses…
won’t you let me polish ‘em for you?

Professor, how about some sweeet fruit?
Say aaah!
You were summoned here too, I assume.
Look, your brothers are gathering too.
Now, let the experiment show begin!
Splendid! This is the power of Reunion!
Yes, yes, this is the specimen state I wanted!
This is perfect—an Ancient captured too!
Let me welcome you anew, Aerith.
Oh? A new specimen… not bad.
You, interested in creating a hero?

Kukuku… an unexpected turn,
but this could yield some fascinating data.

I’ll use you all in my experiments.
Stop your pointless resistance.
I’ve no interest in the Promised Land.

Aerith, what I want
is your body… your cells.

If only you were as beautiful as your mother—
Ifalna’s cells were positively regal.

Still remember the tricks I taught you?
I’ll pamper you again.

Now, you’re the last one.
Surrender quietly.
Oh? A new specimen… not bad.
You, interested in creating a hero?
That’s everyone. Time to wrap this up.
Fighting like this won’t end it.

I’ve got a plan,
so buy me some time, ‘kay!

You wanna help, right?
Gimme a hand real quick!
Hmph, time to call it quits.
Ninja Art: Thunder of the Blue Sky!
Hojo’s turned this into a mess.

No, maybe it’s our fault.
I can’t stay calm when it comes to him.

Don’t sweat it. Anyone’d react the same
seeing that up close.
Yeah, next time I’ll bite his head off.

If we didn’t fight, the damage’d be worse.
Couldn’t be helped.
True. Let’s leave it at that.
Yeah, maybe we could’ve done better.
Leave me alone for a bit.
Yuffie ended up saving our asses, huh.
I couldn’t do a damn thing for ‘em.
That’s just how it was fated.

You wanted to help ‘em.
That feeling’s what matters, right?
Heh, you sayin’ that’s got me all fired up.
It’s all Hojo’s fault, every damn bit of it.

I ain’t lettin’ that jerk get away with this!
I’ll make damn sure he regrets it!
Guess it was just fate or somethin’.

You’re pullin’ out that line now?
That’s a piss-poor excuse, even for you!
Man, I’d love to show Marlene this beautiful sea.
Couldn’t find the bartender, so I just whipped somethin’ up myself.

I used to make it at the bar sometimes.
Said I’d love to visit someday.

Shakin’ cocktails at Seventh Heaven…
Feels like a lifetime ago.
The days at Seventh Heaven feel so far away.

Cloud, do you ever wanna forget?
The tough stuff, the sad stuff…
Can’t forget. The worse it was, the more it sticks.
To the bar? Of course I do.
But I know we’ve gotta keep moving forward.
My heart keeps bouncin’ back and forth, though.
It hasn’t been that long yet.
Hey, wanna make one for Cloud too?

Tifa’s cocktails can wait
till we rebuild Seventh Heaven.
It’s a promise I made with Barret.
When’d you two make a promise like that?
I don’t get why it’s gotta be a secret, but okay.

Someday, when things settle down,
I just wanna stare at the sea and zone out.

Midgar…
It’s just across this sea, right?
My real mom’s name was Ifalna.

She was a Cetra, so Hojo captured her
and did awful things.
That’s why I hate that guy.
Sometimes I even think about revenge.

I get so caught up in dark thoughts
it kinda scares me.
Thinking dark thoughts and getting scared of yourself…
It’s just imagination. Do it till you’re satisfied.

Everyone feels hate sometimes.
Don’t sweat it.
I can’t help but care, though.
Decide what’s next when the time comes.
Based on how you feel then.
Decide based on how I feel then…
Counting on you when the time comes!
No, wait—I just asked the future me!
She’s gonna be one heck of a lady!

Late again…
Looks like my Shinra life’s over.

I’ve made up my mind!
I’m done… I’m quittin’ this damn company!
It’s a rare breather. Go round up the crew.
Well, we had a lil’ ruckus, but still.
Let’s head back to the hotel.
Seaside Johnny, far from the sea.
Thanks to you, we made it.

So, uh… some girls who saw my heroic deeds
told me everything.
About the hotel and Mayor Kapono.

I was totally fooled,
couldn’t see a thing!

You borrowed money, right?
Got a plan to pay it back?

The girls cornered the mayor and said,
‘Keep milkin’ this town-saving hero, and we’ll spread your dirty secrets worldwide~!’
Next thing I know, my debt’s wiped clean!

I’ll turn Seaside Johnny
into a seven-star hotel, just you watch!
I’ll treat you all to the best hospitality!
Man, this guy’s got a long road ahead.
So, what’s next for you all, big bro?

Those guys? They headed toward Mt. Corel
this morning.

Some of ‘em were hurt, so I tried to stop ‘em,
but no dice.

Safe travels, dear guests!
Have a great trip!

Seaside Johnny’ll rise
like a phoenix from here on out!

Need a rest? Beds, rooms—
use whatever you want!
Hey, everybody~! Don’t forget about me!
Sometimes I’m a master materia hunter!
Sometimes I’m a heroic ninja girl!
And just who could I be—?
If I win, you’re my minion!

But if, by some miracle, you win,
I’ll join your little crew!

Well… I mean, I could join you
without a fight, I guess.

Tryin’ to run~?
Fight me, fight me, fight me!

What’s wrong, huh?
You’re scared of my awesome power, right!
You’re scared of my awesome power, right!

Well… I mean, I could join you
without a fight, I guess.

Thought so~!
Guess it’s only natural, knowin’ my skills!

This gorgeous ninja—me—
is gonna join your team!
Oh, whatever! Hmph! Do what you want!
Guess I’ve got no choice~ I’ll join ya!

You sure—really sure—
you don’t wanna invite me along?
Guess I’ve got no choice~ I’ll join ya!

Fine, if that’s how it is,
I’m really gonna leave, okay?

Kidding, just kidding!
Let me join you~!
Follow if you want. Up to you.
Guess I’ve got no choice~ I’ll join ya!

I’ll stuff ya in Junon’s cannon
and blast ya straight to Wutai!
It doesn’t seem to be moving.

Piece o’ cake~!
Just enjoy the view!
Oh, right—Barret knows this area well, huh.
Did ya know materia’s just hardened mako?

So, a mako reactor means
materia might be…
Alright, let’s get pumped and go~!

Yuffie, we’re a team now.
Don’t go actin’ on your own.
What, I need permission for everything?
Oh, okay. Can I sing then?
Shut it—! No to all of it!
Tifa, how’d you put up with this guy?
He’s got more good than bad, though.
Maybe a little bigger gap than that.
Sorry, my legs feel so heavy.

But if we don’t hurry, the materia—er, I mean,
the black capes’ll get away!
I’ll go scout ahead for ya!

You guys catch up later.
See ya soon!

I’m worried, so I’ll go too.
Barret’s actin’ kinda off anyway.
We’ll wait up top, so take your time comin’ up.
Hey~! Is someone pushin’ my back?
It seems the mountain has welcomed her.

Oh, I get it!
Yahoo~ Nice to meet ya~!

It’s common for beginners.
If she collapses, I’ll carry her.
Climbers these days got no manners.
Basic mountain rule’s sayin’ hi, right?
You folks at least talk to me proper.

Thing is, tons of climbers today,
but not one said hello.

Saw some sickly-lookin’ black-cape guys.
Tried talkin’, but they ignored me.
Sheesh, no mountain manners at all.

Oh yeah, some peppy girl
zoomed by at top speed.
Then a big guy and a lady ran after her.
Mountains are about helpin’ each other, y’know.
Hope Yuffie and the others are okay.
These guys got lost in Junon.

We picked ‘em up, but they started freakin’ out mid-flight,
so we’re droppin’ ‘em off here.
No clue why they flipped out all of a sudden.

Oh well, figurin’ it out
ain’t my job anyway.
Me and the rookie here, huh.

I’d love to take you on myself,
but sadly, I’m kinda busy.
So, you’ll have to make do with him today.
Next time, it’s payback, got it?
The Turks are on the move, just like I thought.
Let’s hurry. Barret and the others are waiting.
Next, let’s discuss the ‘Huge Materia Project.’

Abnormal energy readings have been detected
simultaneously at Mako reactors worldwide.
After a detailed analysis of the data,

we’ve concluded there’s an extremely high chance
a massive lifeform exists.
We confirmed that name in ancient records.
Monsters that awaken when the planet faces danger.
They harbor enormous Materia within their bodies.

Or perhaps it’s more accurate to say
the Huge Materia itself became alive.

Ever since I learned of their existence, I’ve yearned for them,
searched for them—the very mystery of the planet and life itself!

I want to caress them with these hands, probe every crevice of their tissue
with these scientific eyes!
This project will make that dream come true.
We’ll seize the Huge Materia with our own hands, after all.

The tech to artificially produce Huge Materia
is *this* close to being practical.
Of course, I’m aware of that.

This project is strictly about
recovering the natural stuff.
Planning to display it in the building’s lobby or something?

I couldn’t care less about the Materia,
but I’ll take the empty husk.
Hey, President, tell us the real reason.
I’ll prep the elite squad for you.

There’s a question the former President
never answered for me.
May I ask you the same thing?

The Mako reactor bombings piggybacking off Avalanche’s actions,
followed by the destruction of Sector 7’s plate and slums—

The former President claimed both were
part of the Neo-Midgar Project.

But in reality, the Promised Land—
the cornerstone of Neo-Midgar—hasn’t been found, and its true nature is still—
The old man got old. And desperate.
That’s the only reason for those reckless moves.

This is a good chance. I’ve had my own questions
about that whole fiasco.
Why didn’t anyone stop the old man’s madness?

I want to change Shinra—
make it taller, deeper,

I’m counting on all of you—who fought alongside the old man—
to make it happen.
Show me loyalty beyond what you gave the old man.
I wonder if Mom’s doing okay.

She was fine when I saw her.
Worried about you, though.
I’m such a bad daughter, huh.
She’d understand if you explained things.
That explanation’s gonna be a hassle.
Yep! Worked up a good sweat.

All clear!
And, uh, no Materia either...
Caught ‘em before they hit the reactor.

Let’s get to that reactor quick!
The black cloaks are already there!
So, what’s up with those black cloak guys?
Oh, so they’re like us in Wutai!
Wutai got bombed all over by Shinra.
The towns, the people—everything got trashed.
And then they forced a shady treaty on us.
Wutai welcomed the ceasefire too, didn’t it?
The old geezers accepted it on their own.

They’ve always made all the decisions for the country,
and everyone just went along with it.

The angry folks pinned their hopes on
Colonel Glenn and his crew.

They smashed those rusty old traditions
and gave Wutai its spark back.

Then Governor Sfuur, a guy the Colonel trusted,
joined up with them.

And bam—revolution time!
That’s how the provisional government got started.

‘Cause the real government’s something
the people will choose after the fight with Shinra’s over.

So, we’re working hard
to ditch that ‘provisional’ part!
What’s wrong? Don’t get left behind!
Hey, hey, is all this Mako?

Then doesn’t that mean
there’s some crazy Materia around here?

Guardians of the planet...
They’re said to appear when the planet’s in danger.
Hey, hey, did you see that?
It had a ginormous Materia inside it, right!?
Catch a guardian of the planet?

Don’t you want a Materia that huge?
It’d all be mine!

Then stay here and figure it out.
We’re moving on.

I’ll be back, Weapon-chan!
Stay healthy ‘til then!

If a Weapon’s showing up,
Shinra’s pushed the planet to the brink, huh.

Means Avalanche was right all along,
don’t it?
Yeah, but Shinra’s not the only cause of this mess.
Let’s go. We’ve gotta save the planet.
It’s a drawbridge. We can’t cross ‘til it’s lowered.
There’s a control room over there that can lower the bridge.

Been abandoned for ages,
so no tellin’ what’s inside now.
I’ll lower the bridge, so hang tight!

Could be Mako exposure.
He should rest for a bit.

Let Cloud rest.
Why don’t we go lower the bridge ourselves?

I’ll buzz you with this thing,
so take it easy ‘til then.
I think I’ll recover after a short break.

The black cloaks seem to be swimming the river.
Let’s play it smart and use the bridge.

That’ll get us up there,
but it ain’t movin’ without power.
Use that. You’re good at hoppin’ around, right?

Gotta unlock it with the control unit upstairs
or it ain’t budgin’.
Hey, over here! We’re your opponents!
Did it get stronger from that tornado?
Looks like it’s taken a liking to you.
Guess we’ve got no choice but to take it along.
Doesn’t it kinda look like Cloud?

On the way back, we’ll ride that thing
and zip down the mountain.

It’s a bumpy ride, but quick and easy.
Back in the day, me and Dyne—

Nah, forget it.
Let’s just lower that bridge already.

Alright, looks good.
Get Cloud and the others on the line.

Hellooo~! This is Yuffie!
Is that Cloud over there~?
How’s your condition? All better now?

We’re takin’ the trolley down,
so you guys hoof it along the tracks.
There’s a suspension bridge on the way, so let’s meet up there.
Oh, and check the route while you’re at it.

Some folks are gettin’ jittery,
so pick a nice, easy path if you can.
Me, I like a little thrill though!
Looks like this switches the tracks.

The tracks are pretty old.
Hope Barret and the others’ll be okay.
Unless something extreme happens, they won’t collapse.
Yeah, I can sense it just by touching them.

Dogs and cats can figure stuff out
with their paws, right? Same thing?
What’s it called… Oh, paw pads!
Mine are far more advanced than that.
I didn’t even say anything yet!
I’ve got a bad feeling about this.

Please? Come on,
Cloud wants to touch them too, right?
I’ll give you a massage when we get to the inn!

This is the meet-up spot, right?
Let’s call Yuffie and the others.
Thanks, man! We’ll meet up soon.
Alright, time for a wild trolley ride!
It’s fine, it won’t shake, won’t wobble…
Cloud, this isn’t what you promised~!

Yeah, it wasn’t as bad as I thought.
Looks like Cloud actually checked the tracks right.
Cloud, you did a damn fine job!
Seems you made it through alright.
It started following us after we saved it.
Looks just like him, right? It’s called Clou-piyo!
Never thought I’d see the great Barret again.
What kinda face you got showin’ back up here?
Well, look here—we’ll give ya a warm welcome!

Hey, little ladies,
stick with him and you’ll end up dead.
Where’s the cash for that supposed to come from?
Shouldn’t have given it to Barret, that’s for sure.
Wish they’d hand out liquor with the rations.
Maybe we should ask Dr. Sheiran.
I still see that day in my dreams.
Gotta get some meds from Dr. Sheiran.
What’s up? Get run outta some town?
You gonna let ‘em talk like that~?
Surprised you had the guts to come back.
What, got yourself a new wife? Unbelievable.
Thinkin’ you can just live it up while we rot?
Thanks to someone, I’m flat-out jobless.
I was supposed to be workin’ at the mako reactor.
Hey, how long you plannin’ to stick around?
What’s that? You got a problem with me?!
I’m just sayin’ what everyone’s thinkin’!
This place has changed—village and people both.
Ain’t got nowhere else to go but here.
We’re not looking for the black cloaks?

Hey, everyone,
can we make a quick stop?
There’s someone I wanna say hi to.

Five years ago, I was brought here from Nibelheim,
and Dr. Sheiran saved me.
So it was Dr. Sheiran who patched up Tifa?

Don’t be swayed.
I’m the only truth you need.
What the hell you doin’, man?!

You’ve got some rough gear on now.
Still, good to see you lookin’ healthy.

I’m creakin’ all over,
but treatin’ patients keeps me goin’.

Of course I do!
Tifa, you’ve grown up so well!

Thanks to you.
I really can’t thank you enough for back then.
If you hadn’t been there, I wouldn’t be here now…

Nah, that was just luck.
Shinra’s chopper happened to be around.

No surprise you don’t remember.
Not all of ‘em are bad folks, y’know.
Tifa, your life was saved by people’s kindness.

Don’t forget that.
I won’t forgive ya if you waste it.
Well, ain’t this a strange crew.

Oh, perfect timing!
Give me a hand.

I need to draw blood from that patient.
Hold ‘em still so they don’t thrash.
These guys’ symptoms match mako poisoning.

But when I checked their blood,
I found something odd.
There’s somethin’ in their blood I don’t recognize.

No idea what it is,
but I’ve seen similar blood before.
Those eyes—you’re a SOLDIER, ain’t ya?

SOLDIER ain’t just a job.
Once you’re in, you’re SOLDIER ‘til you die.
Mind givin’ me some of your blood?

I reckon these folks
might be degraded SOLDIERs.

Just a theory, mind ya.
Need more research to know for sure.
Any other black cloaks show up?

Took in the injured ones,
but the rest headed for Gold Saucer, I hear.

Yup, no clue why.
Don’t ask me.

That little girl growin’ up
and comin’ back with Barret of all people—

What kinda sign is this?
Beats me.
Tifa, don’t go doin’ anything reckless.
Get hurt, you come by anytime.
Checkup fee’s just a little blood if ya don’t mind.
The Gold Saucer’s that famous amusement park where every day’s a festival, right?
